actions.code: await expect(page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Clear completed' })).toBeVisible();

actions.code:
await page.getByRole('textbox', { name: 'What needs to be done?' }).fill('Buy groceries');
await page.keyboard.press('Enter');
actions.intent: Add 'Buy groceries' as a new todo item in the textbox for todo entry.

actions.code: await expect(page.getByRole('checkbox', { name: 'Toggle Todo' })).toBeChecked({ checked: true });
actions.intent: Verify that the checkbox is checked to confirm expectation.

actions.intent: Click the checkbox to mark 'Buy groceries' as complete.
